body_content.explanation: The boiling point of a liquid is the temperature at which it becomes a gas:
examples: The boiling point of water is 100°C.

body_content.explanation: the point when a situation is about to get out of control and become violent:
examples: The situation in the inner city was reaching/at boiling point, so the police were out in force.
